Paul Kleinschmidt // Software Engineer

Welcome to my website! I am Paul Kleinschmidt, a Boston based full stack web developer. I'm currently working for Censinet, a Boston based healthcare startup. There you will find me contributing features and maintaining a high standard of code quality. My focus lately has been on Censinet's tech stack: React, Rails, and Typescript, but I love diving in and learning about new technologies.

You can also find me playing jazz guitar, making hip-hop beats, or trying to rank up in Rocket League. I'm hoping to add some cool stuff to this site so stay tuned!
